title: Grabham (Dr. Michael)
body: An English doctor born on January 11, 1840, who resided in Funchal for many years. He published *The Climate and resources of Madeira*, London, 1870 and *Materia Atlantica*, London, 1901. This latter work, written in Portuguese, was intended to serve as a guide for people visiting this island, on the occasion of the visit of the kings of Portugal. Dr. Grabham published some articles in the London press about Madeira.

1870: Dr. Michael Grabham published *The Climate and resources of Madeira* in 1870
1901: Dr. Michael Grabham published *Materia Atlantica* in 1901
